prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: Will Stefan express romantic feelings for me within the next 3 months?

Stefan should be represented by the Ascendant's 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

Due to the lack of planets in the 9th house, Stefan should be represented by Mars, the 9th house ruler.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a systematic list of the horary chart data relevant to your query according to classic horary principles. In this reading, you (the querent) are represented by the Ascendant, and Stefan is represented by Mars as the ruler of the Ascendant’s 9th house (given the empty 9th). All data below have been extracted directly from your provided chart:

1. Planetary Positions and House Placements
 • Ascendant: 7° Pisces (querent’s significator)
 • Mars (Stefan’s significator): 18° Cancer, located in the 5th house
 • Sun: 19° Aquarius, positioned in the 12th house
 • Moon: 17° Gemini, positioned in the 3rd house
 • Mercury: 17° Aquarius, positioned in the 12th house
 • Venus: 2° Aries, placed in the 1st house (along with Saturn, Neptune, North Node, and Chiron)
 • Jupiter: 11° Gemini, placed in the 3rd house
 • Saturn: 18° Pisces, placed in the 1st house
 • Uranus: 23° Taurus, placed in the 2nd house
 • Neptune: 28° Pisces, placed in the 1st house (in its rulership as Neptune in Pisces)
 • Pluto: 2° Aquarius, placed in the 12th house
 • North Node: 29° Pisces, placed in the 1st house (retrograde)
 • Chiron: 19° Aries, placed in the 1st house

2. Major Aspects (with orbs)
 • Venus Sextile Pluto (orb: 0°)
 • Sun Sextile Chiron (orb: 0°)
 • Saturn Square IC (orb: 0°)
 • Saturn Square MC (orb: 0°)
 • MC Opposition IC (orb: 0°)
 • Mars Trine Saturn (orb: 0°)
 • Moon Trine Mercury (orb: 0°)
 • Chiron Sextile IC (orb: 1°)
 • Mercury Sextile MC (orb: 1°)
 • Sun Sextile MC (orb: 1°)
 • Mars Square Chiron (orb: 1°)
 • Moon Square Saturn (orb: 1°)
 • Moon Opposition MC (orb: 1°)
 • Neptune Conjunction North Node (orb: 1°)
 • Moon Conjunction IC (orb: 1°)
 • Chiron Trine MC (orb: 1°)
 • Mercury Trine IC (orb: 1°)
 • Sun Trine IC (orb: 1°)
 • Mercury Sextile Chiron (orb: 2°)
 • Moon Sextile Chiron (orb: 2°)
 • Sun Conjunction Mercury (orb: 2°)
 • Sun Trine Moon (orb: 2°)
 • Pluto Sextile North Node (orb: 3°)
 • Venus Conjunction North Node (orb: 3°)
 • Jupiter Square Ascendant (orb: 4°)
 • Sun Square Uranus (orb: 4°)
 • Venus Conjunction Neptune (orb: 4°)
 • Uranus Sextile Neptune (orb: 5°)
 • Saturn Sextile Uranus (orb: 5°)
 • Mars Sextile Uranus (orb: 5°)
 • Mercury Square Uranus (orb: 6°)
 • Moon Conjunction Jupiter (orb: 6°)
 • Mercury Trine Jupiter (orb: 6°)
 • Jupiter Square Saturn (orb: 7°)
 • Jupiter Opposition MC (orb: 7°)
 • Jupiter Conjunction IC (orb: 7°)
 • Sun Trine Jupiter (orb: 8°)

3. Key Patterns Identified
 • T-Square: Involving the MC (18° Sagittarius), Saturn (18° Pisces), and IC (18° Gemini); with Jupiter (11° Gemini) and the Moon (17° Gemini) contributing to the configuration. This emphasizes tensions around the angular (public/frequent) areas of the chart.
 • Yod: With Mars at 18° Cancer, MC at 18° Sagittarius, and Mercury at 17° Aquarius (with the Sun at 19° Aquarius also part of this configuration). Given Mars’ role as Stefan’s significator, this pattern will be critical in the interpretation.
 • Cradle: Involving the Moon (17° Gemini), MC (18° Sagittarius), Mercury (17° Aquarius), Chiron (19° Aries), Sun (19° Aquarius), and IC (18° Gemini). This emphasizes interplay between personal feelings and external influences.

4. Additional Structural Features
 • The chart displays a Bowl shape.
 • The Air element is dominant among the inner planets, with no inner planets in Earth signs.
 • The Mutable modality is dominant among the inner planets.
 • There is an empty 9th house, prompting the use of Mars as the alternative significator for Stefan (given the 9th is linked with foreign or external connections).
 • Most inner planets fall in the bottom and left (IC) quadrants, which marks an emphasis on internal and subjective experiences.
 • The sextile aspect occurs most frequently with 11 instances, indicating many opportunities for harmonious exchanges.
 • Sun and Mercury partake in 11 aspects each, emphasizing their influence in the overall reading.

This compilation of chart data—positions, aspects, patterns, and structural features—provides a comprehensive foundation for applying horary principles to your query regarding whether Stefan (represented by Mars) will express romantic feelings within the next three months.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Examining the chart details according to classical horary principles, the following points arise in relation to whether Stefan (represented by Mars in Cancer in the 5th house) will express romantic feelings within the next three months:

1. Stefan’s Significator (Mars in Cancer, 5th House)
 • Mars in Cancer tends to express emotions indirectly; its placement in the 5th house of romance and creativity implies that questions of love or romantic gestures may surface.
 • The presence of Mars in a water sign suggests that his approach to romance is filtered through sensitive and possibly cautious feelings.

2. Key Aspects Involving Mars
 • Mars Trine Saturn (orb: 0°): This is a supportive and stabilizing aspect. It indicates that if Stefan does express feelings, there will be a sense of responsibility or a desire for structure behind his actions. The aspect suggests that his actions, while potentially emotionally guarded, may emerge from genuine inner conviction.
 • Mars Square Chiron (orb: 1°): This relatively tense aspect points to underlying vulnerabilities or wounds related to self-expression. It warns that any attempt by Stefan to reveal his affections might be accompanied by sensitivity, hesitation, or the risk of feeling exposed.

3. Support from the Querent’s Chart
 • Your significator, represented by the Ascendant in Pisces along with several key planets (Venus, Saturn, Neptune, North Node, Chiron) reinforces an environment of deep feeling. This clustering in the 1st house marks you as receptive yet also suggests that your own issues with boundaries or idealism may influence the interaction.
 • The presence of Venus in Aries and its horizontal aspects indicate a strong drive for affirmation, but also caution in balancing personal desires with reality.

4. Patterns and Structural Features
 • The Yod configuration (involving Mars, Mercury, and the Midheaven) centers on Mars, highlighting that unconventional or fated circumstances may drive his actions. A Yod often signals that a change—sometimes precipitated by moments of insight or pressure—is in store.
 • The T-square and Cradle patterns suggest tensions between your personal needs, public expectations, and internal dynamics. These conditions point to an environment where external pressures (represented by family circumstances or social roles) might delay or complicate any open expression of romantic feelings.

5. Timing Indicators
 • The overall configuration does not show any direct transits that force an immediate breakthrough; however, the active aspects involving Mars are moving through a period conducive to inner transformation.
 • The supportive Mars–Saturn trine indicates that a gradual build-up of confidence or recognition of mutual warmth might lead to some form of expression over the next three months—if accompanied by a situation that alleviates the hesitations indicated by the Mars–Chiron square.

Interpretation Based on These Factors:
The chart leans toward the possibility that Stefan may come to express some form of romantic feeling during the next three months, though his manner might be tentative and possibly marred by lingering vulnerabilities. His emotional expression appears influenced by a need for security (Mars trine Saturn), but the inherent caution in his sign (Mars in Cancer) and the challenging aspect with Chiron suggest that his expression may be intermittent or nuanced rather than overtly assertive.

The indication is that while there is momentum for some acknowledgment of romantic interest, it is bound by emotional caution and external complexities. Further developments in your interpersonal or social context may either compel him to overcome these barriers or reinforce his hesitance.
swipes:
Examining the chart details according to classical horary principles, the following points arise in relation to whether Stefan (represented by Mars in Cancer in the 5th house) will express romantic feelings within the next three months:

1. Stefan’s Significator (Mars in Cancer, 5th House)
 • Mars in Cancer tends to express emotions indirectly; its placement in the 5th house of romance and creativity implies that questions of love or romantic gestures may surface.
 • The presence of Mars in a water sign suggests that his approach to romance is filtered through sensitive and possibly cautious feelings.

2. Key Aspects Involving Mars
 • Mars Trine Saturn (orb: 0°): This is a supportive and stabilizing aspect. It indicates that if Stefan does express feelings, there will be a sense of responsibility or a desire for structure behind his actions. The aspect suggests that his actions, while potentially emotionally guarded, may emerge from genuine inner conviction.
 • Mars Square Chiron (orb: 1°): This relatively tense aspect points to underlying vulnerabilities or wounds related to self-expression. It warns that any attempt by Stefan to reveal his affections might be accompanied by sensitivity, hesitation, or the risk of feeling exposed.

3. Support from the Querent’s Chart
 • Your significator, represented by the Ascendant in Pisces along with several key planets (Venus, Saturn, Neptune, North Node, Chiron) reinforces an environment of deep feeling. This clustering in the 1st house marks you as receptive yet also suggests that your own issues with boundaries or idealism may influence the interaction.
 • The presence of Venus in Aries and its horizontal aspects indicate a strong drive for affirmation, but also caution in balancing personal desires with reality.

4. Patterns and Structural Features
 • The Yod configuration (involving Mars, Mercury, and the Midheaven) centers on Mars, highlighting that unconventional or fated circumstances may drive his actions. A Yod often signals that a change—sometimes precipitated by moments of insight or pressure—is in store.
 • The T-square and Cradle patterns suggest tensions between your personal needs, public expectations, and internal dynamics. These conditions point to an environment where external pressures (represented by family circumstances or social roles) might delay or complicate any open expression of romantic feelings.

5. Timing Indicators
 • The overall configuration does not show any direct transits that force an immediate breakthrough; however, the active aspects involving Mars are moving through a period conducive to inner transformation.
 • The supportive Mars–Saturn trine indicates that a gradual build-up of confidence or recognition of mutual warmth might lead to some form of expression over the next three months—if accompanied by a situation that alleviates the hesitations indicated by the Mars–Chiron square.

Interpretation Based on These Factors:
The chart leans toward the possibility that Stefan may come to express some form of romantic feeling during the next three months, though his manner might be tentative and possibly marred by lingering vulnerabilities. His emotional expression appears influenced by a need for security (Mars trine Saturn), but the inherent caution in his sign (Mars in Cancer) and the challenging aspect with Chiron suggest that his expression may be intermittent or nuanced rather than overtly assertive.

The indication is that while there is momentum for some acknowledgment of romantic interest, it is bound by emotional caution and external complexities. Further developments in your interpersonal or social context may either compel him to overcome these barriers or reinforce his hesitance.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: My apologies, I'm not sure I understand, can you explain a little more clearly please?

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
adjusting my shawl as I lean forward, my eyes fixed intently on the chart Let me be more direct, my dear. The chart shows clear indications about Stefan's feelings and likely actions:

The key points are:

1. Mars (representing Stefan) is in Cancer in the 5th house - the house of romance and love affairs. This shows he harbors deep romantic feelings but keeps them hidden due to Cancer's protective nature.

2. The aspects show internal conflict:
- His feelings are genuine (Mars trine Saturn)
- He's struggling with expressing them (Mars square Chiron)
- There's hesitation due to existing commitments (T-square pattern)

3. Timing-wise, within 3 months:
The chart suggests he will likely express these feelings, but in a careful, possibly indirect way. The Mars placement shows he'll approach it sensitively, perhaps testing the waters first rather than making a bold declaration.

tapping a long-nailed finger on the chart

To be completely frank, my dear - yes, he will express romantic feelings toward you within this timeframe. However, it will likely come in subtle ways at first - perhaps through meaningful glances, finding reasons to be near you, or sharing personal thoughts he doesn't share with others.

The chart suggests he's wrestling with these feelings internally right now. The expression of them seems inevitable, but he's taking great care in how to approach this delicate situation.

Does this help clarify the reading for you?

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you. Are there any further timing indicators that allude to the possibility of when this may occur?

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Examining the Moon’s current phase alongside Mars’ placement in Cancer provides some timing clues. With Mars set at 18° Cancer, its gradual transit suggests that significant activation may occur once the Moon—marked today as a waxing gibbous in Gemini—moves into a phase that forms a supportive aspect with Mars. In horary terms, this kind of activation, particularly when influenced by the critical Yod (with its apex involving Mars and the Midheaven), can often lead to a turning point within roughly 4 to 8 weeks.

Further reinforcing this window, the tension shown in the T-square pattern hints that the internal buildup of emotional energy may reach a threshold as the lunar cycle continues its natural progress. When the next full Moon occurs, the Moon’s heightened visibility and influence will likely support Mars in expressing those delicate sentiments.

Based on these chart factors, the strongest opportunity for Stefan to reveal his romantic feelings appears likely to occur in a window of approximately 4 to 8 weeks from now.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Actually, the moon goes full next week.  five days from right now.  Mars goes direct in nine days from now.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Based on your updated details, we adjust the timing indicators as follows:

1. The Full Moon in five days will catalyze emotional energy, making hidden feelings more visible and stirring subjects represented by the Moon’s influence. In horary terms, the full Moon’s illumination often acts as a trigger for actions that have been held in reserve.

2. Mars going direct in nine days signals the removal of any delay or internal blockage. This change in Mars’ motion means that the hesitations indicated by the Mars–Chiron square are likely to be reduced, allowing for more straightforward expression of intent.

In practical terms, these factors suggest that the built-up energy surrounding Stefan’s stored emotions (as his significator) will shift toward more obvious action shortly after these events. The direct motion of Mars complements the activating effect of the full Moon, supporting the notion that his romantic feelings are moving from internal contemplation to external expression.

These transits imply that the window for potential manifestation of his feelings is likely to narrow—possibly within the next 2 to 3 weeks—since the combined influence of the full Moon and Mars going direct can serve as a catalyst for representing his personal truths in the public sphere.
